connect20/magedebugger.name: connect20/Magedebugger

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/magedebugger.description: Our developers sometimes fell crazy when debug on customer live store. It's very hard to debug in silence. Now our Mage Debugger extension is a real magic. You can debug and see the result in your own screen, not the screen of store.
